loans.name: Paulina

texts.en:
Paulina is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with six children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Paulina dreams that one day, She will be able to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Connie

texts.en:
Connie is 55 years old and has five children. Connie is married and has one child who is in school.

Connie is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Connie requested a PHP 14000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Connie has been raising pigs for 15 years now, and has borrowed 13 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Connie would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Ruben Alfredo

texts.es: Rubén de 49 años de edad vive junto a su esposa en casa propia. Él se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de granos básicos (frijol y maíz), ya tiene más de 15 años de experiencia en el rubro, que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, cuando ya está lista la cosecha la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía y la comercializa en todas las zonas aledañas y tiene mucha clientela, él es un hombre emprendedor dispuesto a salir adelante, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción pero no posee de suficiente capital para la compra de insumos semilla, insecticida, abono, algunas herramientas de trabajo etc.  por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar dichos productos y asi seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Rubén is 49 years old and lives with his wife in his house. He works in agriculture, specifically growing basic grains (beans and corn). He has 15 years experience in the field which allows him to have better harvests. When the harvest is ready he stores it in the silos shown in the photo and sells it in the neighboring areas and has many clients. He is an enterprising man ready to get ahead.

In this planting season he wants to increase production but he does not have sufficient capital to buy inputs like seeds, insecticide, manure, some work tools, etc. So he decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow him to buy these products and continue with his work so he can obtain higher income.

loans.use: to buy inputs like seeds, insecticide, manure, some work tools, etc.

loans.name: Melonita

texts.en:
Melonita is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Melonita is 43 years old and has three children who are in school.

Melonita has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Melonita requested a PHP 13000 loan amount through NWTF to buy feeds, vaccines and other supplies for her pigs.

Melonita has been in this business for 9 years. In the future, Melonita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vaccines and other supplies for her pigs

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with four children, three of whom in school.

She runs a business selling books in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of books to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like food vending and farming rice.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Leonora dreams that one day She will be able to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of books to sell

loans.name: Aishahan

texts.ru: Айшахан, 45 лет, замужем, есть сын. У нее среднее образование. В настоящее время Айшахан занимается животноводством и полеводством, сын и супруг помогают по хозяйству. Айшахан с большой ответственностью относится к своему делу. Ежегодно она обрабатывает 1,20 Га земли, где выращивает арбузы, в хозяйстве есть 4 коровы, 10 овец. Айшахан обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) для покупки семян, удобрений для обработки почвы и клеенки для парника, чтобы выращивать экологически чистые арбузы. Доходы от кредита она направит на дальнейшее развитие бизнеса, также хочет накопить на постройку дома.
texts.en: Aishahan is 45, married and has a son. She has a high school education and currently raises livestock and plants crops. Her spouse and her son help her on the farm. Aishahan is a responsible worker. Every year she grows watermelons on a 1.2 hectare plot of land. She also has four cows and ten sheep. Aishahan applied for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy seeds, fertilizer to treat the soil, and plastic sheeting for the greenhouse so she can grow watermelon. She plans to use the earnings from the loan to continue developing her business and to save money to build a house.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and plastic sheeting in order to grow organic watermelon

loans.name: Oeun's Group

texts.en:
A 55-year-old mother of four children, two of them are dependent child, Oeun is living in Kampong Cham province. Nowadays, she lives in a family with her four children and two among them are dependent on her. To overcome her family’s hardship, she grows sesame, corn and works on the other farm for fee as well. She has been involved in these businesses for more than five years and it earns her about 49,400KHR per day. 

Due to a lack of funds, she is now leading a group to apply for a new loan via VisionFund to seeds and pay for labor fee to do farming. She hopes this loan will help her to earn more income and have a better living condition.

loans.use: to buy seeds and pay for labor fees

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Ines

texts.es: Inés de 43 años de edad vive junto a su esposo y sus cuatro hijos en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de frijol y maíz,  tiene más  de 30 años de dedicarse a esa actividad y gracias a eso es que le permite mantener la calidad de sus cosechas,  cuando ya está lista la cosecha la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía y la comercializa en todos los pueblos aledaños y tiene mucha clientela por los precios accesibles, ella quiere aumentar la producción de sus cosechas pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, insecticida, abono, algunas herramientas de trabajo etc. y de esta manera poder salir adelante y poder  darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Inés is 43 years old and lives with her husband and four children in their own house. She works in agriculture and has made a living for the last 30 years growing beans and corn. Thanks to her experience she has been able to keep up the quality of her harvest. When the harvest is ready, she stocks it up in the silos (shown in the photo) and sells it in all the neighboring towns. She has many customers due to her affordable prices.

Inés wants to increase the production of her harvests but lacks the resources for it, so she is requesting a loan to buy corn seeds, beans, insecticide, fertilizer, some work tools, etc. This will enable her to move ahead and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, beans, insecticide, fertilizer, some work tools, etc.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es: Oscar de 37 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa, es un hombre trabajador dedicado a su familia, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, elabora puertas, balcones, rejas entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio y tiene mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mejorar cada día su labor, ya tiene mucha clientela pues lo buscan por la calidad de su trabajo, por los precios accesibles pero sobre todo porque siempre realiza el trabajo al gusto del cliente; el solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar, hierro, metal, herramienta etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Oscar is 37 years old and lives in a house that he owns together with his wife. He is a hard-working man who is dedicated to his family. He has a metal workshop where he makes doors, balconies and grills amongst other things. He has been in the business for a number of years and has lots of experience which allows him to improve his work each day. He has lots of clients who seek him out for the quality of his work, his accessible prices but moreover because he always does the work to please his client.  He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allows him to buy steel, metal, tools, etc. so he can have greater income.

loans.use: to buy steel, metal, tools, etc.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell rice business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice sell for her buy and sell rice business.

Marlyn has been in this business for 20 years. Marlyn earns more income from raising pigs and general store.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Marlyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is 41 years old, married with three children.

Merlinda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store.

Merlinda has borrowed and paid 9 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 4 years and also earns an income from buying and selling livestock.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Merlinda aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Perlita

texts.en:
Perlita is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with four children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF in order to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

She supplements this income with earnings from her selling livestock.

Perlita dreams that one day, She will be able to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Miguela

texts.en:
Miguela is 35 years old and has three children. Miguela is married and has three children who are in school.

Miguela is in the agricultural business and pig fattening in the Philippines. Miguela requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Miguela has been in pig fattening for 10 years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Miguela would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Divina

texts.en:
Divina is 36 years old, married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a direct selling of beauty products in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of beauty products to sell.

Divina has borrowed and paid 2 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the direct selling of beauty products for 5 years and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of beauty products to sell

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Nenita works hard to support her family.

She has a raising livestock business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Nenita is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock for her raising livestock business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Nenita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 7 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Seun's Group

texts.en:
Seun, 31, is a single lady living in Kampong Cham province. Nowadays, she grows rice on two hectares farmland and works as a construction worker for fee to support her living. She has been involved in these businesses for thirteen years and it earns her about 53,300KHR per day. 

Due to lack of funds, she is now leading a group of two to apply for a first Kiva loan from VisionFund. As a group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer and pay for plowing and labor fee. She hopes this loan will help her to earn more income and expand her current businesses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for plowing and labor fees

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Gulchiroy

texts.en:
Gulchiroy is a hospitable woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1968. She is now living in a remote district with her family. She is married and has three children. Her husband is working abroad. She is a retailer and buys and sells children's wear and women's shoes. She has many years of practice in this sphere and knows well her duty. She has permanent clients every day and works hard to earn money to ensure her children. 

She is planning to widen her business to buy children’s clothes and shoes for the upcoming season. She is asking financial support from IMON and KIVA lenders to buy a new assortment of kids wear and women's shoes. She hopes to be supported.

loans.use: to buy a new assortment of children's wear and women's shoes

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 33 years old and married with three children. All of her children are currently in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Lolita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her sari-sari store.

Lolita has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, sugar, soap, and other groceries. 

In the future, Lolita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her store.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 52 years old and married with nine children. One child is in school.

Myrna is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Myrna requested a 16,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Myrna has been raising pigs for seven years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Myrna would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Rolina

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Rolina works hard to support her family.

She has a used-clothing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Rolina is borrowing 13,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more stock of used clothes to sell.

Rolina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Madadsho

texts.ru: Мададшо 63 летный сильный и ответственный мужчина. Он на районе Муминобод живет вместе женой и сыновьям. Сыновьям 33 и 28 лет. Жена пенсионерка, а дети занимается земледелием на районе. Мададшо на районе опытный и авторитетный человек. Его все знает. Он занимается земледелием. Мададшо настоящий дехканин. Он любить работать на земле и любить когда получает богатый и качественный урожай. В этом летном сезоне Мададшо хочет посадить картофель, и вперед посева урожай хочет отработать землю минеральными удобрениями. Он планирует взять кредит и за счет кредита приобрести семена картофель и минеральные удобрения. Мададшо ждет Вашу доброту.
texts.en: Madadsho is a 63-year-old strong and responsible man. He lives with his wife and sons in the Muminobod region. His sons are 33 and 28 years old. His wife is retired, and the children are engaged in agriculture in the area. Madadsho is an experienced and respected person in the area. Everybody knows him. He grows crops. Madadsho is a real farmer. He loves to work the land and loves when he gets a rich and high quality harvest. In this summer season Madadsho wants to plant potatoes, and before sowing his crops he wants to treat the soil with mineral fertilizer. He plans to take a loan and use it to acquire potato seeds and mineral fertilizer. Madadsho looks forward to your kindness.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is 31 years old and has four children. Nida is married and has two children who are currently in school.

Nida is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Nida requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional piglets, feeds and other supplies for her business.

Nida has been in pig fattening for 10 years now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Nida would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional piglets, feeds and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Tita

texts.en:
Tita is 61 years old, married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell.

Tita has borrowed and paid 14 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 3 years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell

loans.name: Rogelia

texts.en:
Rogelia works hard to support her family. Rogelia is married and has a pig fattening business in the Philippines.

Rogelia requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Rogelia has been in this business for 3 years now.

Rogelia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell to her customers for her vegetable vending business.

Susan has been in this business for 6 years. Susan earns more income from general store.

Susan has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell to her customers

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is 31 years old and married with two children. One child is in school.

Remedios is in the agricultural business – pig fattening – in the Philippines. Remedios requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Remedios has been in pig fattening for 3 years now, and has borrowed 4 times from NWTF in the past to sustain it.

Remedios would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Khuoch's Group

texts.en:
Khuoch, 21, is a mother of two small children living in Battambang province. To overcome her family’s hardship, she has been growing cassava for sale and working on other farms for fees, for about several years. 

Due to lack of funds, she is now leading a group of three to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy cassava seeds, fertilizer and pay for labor fees. She hopes this first loan cycle will help her to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy cassava seeds, fertilizer and pay for labor fees

loans.name: Touch's Group

texts.en:
Touch is a mother of two children and one of them is in school while the other one is too young to attend school. She is 36 years old and a cassava and sesame farmer living Battambang province. She has been involved in these businesses about twelve years. 

Due to lack of funds, she is now leading a group of two to apply for a Kiva loan via VisionFund to fulfill her need. As a group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy seeds and pay for labor and plowing fee. She hopes she could earn more income and improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy cassava seeds and pay for labor and plowing fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: cement, sand, gravel, iron and sheet metal in order to build walls for her house.

loans.name: Umarsho

texts.ru:
Это дехканин Умаршо. Умаршо 3 года занят сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Он вместе отцом занимается земледелием. Его научил отец, чтобы он в дальнейшем продвигал его деятельность. У него есть не большой земельный участок  для выращивание растение. 
Умаршо женат, и имеет двоих детей. У него один 2 летный сын и одна 1 летняя дочка. Жене 25 лет.  Умаршо живет вместе отцом, матерью, братом, женой и детьми. Он хочет купить семена картофель и минеральные удобрение. Из-за нехватки денежных средств он просит кредит.
texts.en: This farmer is Umarsho. Umarsho has been engaged in agricultural activities for three years. He grows crops together with his father. His father taught him so that he could continue his business in the future. He has a small plot of land for growing crops. Umarsho is married and has two children. He has a two-year-old son and a one-year-old daughter. His wife is 25 years old. Umarsho lives with his father, mother, brother, wife and children. He wants to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizer. He is asking for a loan because he has insufficient money.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 63 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico con su cónyuge y su hijo en el distrito de Cañaris, que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Ferreñafe, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café de variedad catimore, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 30 años y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cultivo de café, esto lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto lo que le generará ingresos mayores que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is 63 years old and lives with his spouse and son in their own home made of rustic materials. He lives in the Cañaris district, which is located in the Ferreñafe province of the Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. The inhabitants of this district work in agriculture and ranching.

Juan works in agriculture, specifically farming the Catimor variety of coffee. He has on the order of 30 years of experience, and has good personal and professional references in his district. He will use the granted loan to invest in agricultural work, application and incorporation of pesticides, fertilizers and labor for his farm. This will help him to improve his crops’ appearance, structure, and productivity and ensure a successful harvest. 

Consequently he will have better production and a higher quality product, and will have no trouble selling it. This will give him a better income, improving his family’s and his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in agricultural work, application and incorporation of pesticides, fertilizers and labor for his farm.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 30 years old, married and has two children in school. 

Vilma is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Vilma requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Vilma has been raising livestock for 20 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Vilma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Gulzodahon

texts.ru: Гулзодахон, 45 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. Она в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1990 году с суммы в 1,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Гулзодахон в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 7 коров, 25 овец, также есть земельный надел, мерою 0,80 Га, где Гулзодахон со своей семьей выращивают органическую кукурузу, подсолнечник, хлопок. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку рассады и удобрений.  Доходы от кредита она вложит в расширение бизнеса и хочет построить сарай для скота.
texts.en: Gulzodahon is 45 years old, married, and the mother of three children. She rears animals and grows crops as the main source of income for her family, having started in 1990 with a sum of 1,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Gulzodahon's hard work today she has seven cows and 25 sheep, and she also has a 0.8 hectare plot of land where Gulzodahon and her family grow organic corn, sunflowers, and cotton. In order to further develop her business, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy seedlings and fertilizer. She will invest the proceeds of the loan in expanding her business and wants to build a livestock barn.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer to grow organic produce.

loans.name: Phal's Group

texts.en:
Phal is a rural villager living in Battambang province. She is a sixty-year-old mother of a child and has been a rice farmer for twelve years. In order to earn additional income, she works on the other farms to get a fee as well. Through these businesses, she could earn about 17,900KHR per day. 

Phal has been with VisionFund for two cycles already and completely repaid back the loans. The previous loans help her to have a better living condition. And now she decides to form as a group to take a new loan, as a group leader she will use her loan portion to pay for plowing fees. She hopes her business will be expanded through this loan.

loans.use: to pay for plowing fees and to be able to expand her agricultural business

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store in the Philippines. Arlene has been in this business for 2 years now.

Arlene requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell.

In the future, Arlene would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Gulzada

texts.ru: Гулзада, 42 года, замужем, мать 3 детей. У нее среднее образование. В настоящее время занимается животноводством и полеводством, по хозяйству помогает муж и дети. Гулзада с большой ответственностью относится к своему делу. Ежегодно обрабатывает 0,57 Га собственной и 1,0 Га арендованной земли, выращивает ячмень, в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 15 овец, 3 лошади. Гулзада обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) для покупки коровы и нетели. Доходы от кредита Гулзада направит на дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, также хочет накопить на обучение детей.
texts.en: Gulzada is 42 years old, married, and the mother of three children. She has a secondary education. At present she rears animals and grows crops. Her husband and children help her on the farm. Gulzada has a very responsible attitude to her work. She cultivates 0.57 hectares of her own and 1.0 hectares of rented land each year. She grows barley, and she has three cows, fifteen sheep, and three horses. Gulzada has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow and heifer. Gulzada will direct the proceeds of the loan to the further development of her business, and she also wants to save up for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a cow and heifer to increase her herd.

loans.name: Umidahon

texts.ru: Умидахон, 24 года, замужем,есть новорожденный сын. У нее среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается торговлей одеждой. В обороте есть товар на сумму 200,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Умидахон решила развить свою деятельность и обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение товара в обороте. Доходы от кредита позволят Умидахон улучшить благосостояние ее семьи и дальше развивать бизнес.
texts.en: Umidahon is 24 years old, married, and has a newborn son. She has a secondary education. She sells clothes for her family's main income. She has 200,000 som (KGS) of goods in stock each month. Umidahon has decided to develop her business and has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to increase her stock of goods. The proceeds of the loan will enable Umidahon to improve her family's well-being and further develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for resale in order to increase her stock of goods.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan de 35 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y su hijo, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de dedicarse a las siembras y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para poder obtener una buena cosecha, también trabaja como motorista de un tractor en una empresa cerca de su casa, vende su producto en todas las zonas aledañas de donde el reside, es un hombre muy  trabajador siempre está buscando la manera de sacar adelante a su familia, por eso decidió en solicitar a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar insumos semilla, herbicida, abonos etc. y asi poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan is 35 years old and lives with his wife and child. He makes a living cultivating corn and beans. He has worked in planting seeds for several years, which has given him the experience he needs to obtain a good harvest, and he sells his products in all the neighboring areas from where he lives. He also works as a tractor driver for a business near his house. 

Juan is a very hardworking man who is always looking for ways to give his family a better life. As a result, he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will enable him to buy seeds, weed-killer, fertilizer, etc., enabling him to increase his income and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, weed-killer, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Medelkan

texts.ru: Меделкан, 58 лет, вдова, мать 2 детей. У нее среднее образование. Меделкан на пенсии, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Меделкан уже 25 лет занимается сельским хозяйством. В хозяйстве есть 2 коровы. Благодаря упорному труду Меделкан, ее деятельность приносит около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц, этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь, поэтому Меделкан в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы. Доходы от кредита позволят Меделкан развить ее бизнес и улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Medelkan is 58 years old, a widow, and the mother of two children. She has a secondary education. Medelkan is retired. For the last 25 years Medelkan has farmed for the main income for her family. She has two cows. Thanks to Medelkan's hard work, her business brings in about 15,000 som (KGS) per month, but this money is not enough for a satisfactory life. As a result, in order to further develop her business Medelkan has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow. The proceeds of the loan will enable Medelkan to develop her business and improve the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to buy a cow in order to increase the income from her business.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie works hard to support her family. Elsie is widowed and has a fishing net making business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years now.

Elsie requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy materials for her business.

Elsie would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy materials for her fish net making business.

loans.name: Abdykaiym

texts.ru: Абдыкайым, 49 лет, женат, имеет 5 детей. Образование- среднее, 20 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. На сегодняшний день есть 2 коровы, 0,44 Га земли, где выращивает картофель. Ежемесячная прибыль Абдыкайыма составляет около 19,000 сом (KGS). Он регулярно осматривает скот, делает прививки. Абдыкайым обратился в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы.  Доходы от кредита он планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса и постройку сараев для скота.
texts.en: Abdykaiym is 49 years old, married, and has five children. He has a secondary education. He has been rearing animals and growing crops for 20 years. Today he has two cows and 0.44 hectares of land where he grows potatoes. Abdykaiym's monthly profit is about 19,000 som (KGS). He regularly checks his cattle and vaccinates them. Abdykaiym has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow. He plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further developing his business and building barns for his cattle.

loans.use: to buy a cow to increase his herd.

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es: Juan tiene 34 años de edad y vive en cada propia junto a su madre y su hermano desde hace 30 años, por lo que se siente feliz aunque sabe que las condiciones de su vivienda no son las adecuadas para vivir. Juan se dedica desde hace 2 años a prestar sus servicios de albañil, a pesar de no contar con mucha experiencia es muy solicitado ya que ha demostrado ser muy responsable e íntegro con su trabajo. Juan desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida, ya que su humilde vivienda solo cuenta con paredes de madera que se encuentra deteriorada, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir las bases de su vivienda, y de esta manera poco a poco ir construyendo su vivienda, ya que sabe que para ello necesita una buena inversión económica.
texts.en:
Juan is 34 years old and has lived in his own house with his mother and his brother for 30 years. He is happy for this although he knows the conditions of his house are not fit to live in. Juan has worked for the past two years as a bricklayer and despite not having much experience he is in demand as he has shown himself to be very responsible and honorable in his work.

Juan wants to improve his living conditions and his modest house only has wooden walls that are in poor condition. So he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick and re-bar to construct a foundation for his house and in this way little by little he can build his house as he knows to do this he needs a good economic investment.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick and re-bar to construct the foundation of his house.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 49 years old and has three children. She is married and all three of her children are in school.

Emma is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Emma requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins and vaccines for her business.

Emma has been raising pigs for 2 years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Emma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines for her pig raising business.

loans.name: Felissa

texts.en:
Felissa works hard to support seven children. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 18,00 loan through NWTF to invest in a solar lamp. She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to have backup lighting in case of emergency.

Felissa is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money, she is also helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a solar lamp.

loans.name: Esmeralda

texts.en:
Esmeralda is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 48 years old and has two children who are still in school.

Esmeralda has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Esmeralda has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Ester

texts.en:
Ester is 53 years old and married with five children. With three children still in school, Ester works very hard to provide for them.

Ester runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like cereals, bath soap, detergent soap, coffee, seasonings, toothpaste, diapers, etc. to sell.

Ester has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as cereals, bath soap, detergent soap, coffee, seasonings, toothpaste, diapers, etc.

In the future, Ester would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items like cereals, bath soap, detergent soap, coffee, seasonings, toothpaste, diapers, etc. to sell

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 48 years old and has four children. She is married and three of her children are in school.

She is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Rebecca requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of feed.

Rebecca has been pig fattening for 13 years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rebecca would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of feed.

loans.name: Francisco Elmer

texts.es: Francisco de 39 años de edad es un hombre muy trabajador, él se dedica desde hace 5 años al cultivo de maíz y frijoles, como todo campesino pone mucho empeño a su trabajo para poder sacar una buena cosecha y luego ponerla a la venta y de esta forma poder sacar los ingresos necesarios para su hogar, Francisco esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un crédito para invertir en abono, herbicidas, fertilizantes, controles de plagas para el cultivo de maíz y frijoles y así continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: Francisco is a 39 year old man who is very hard-working. For the last 5 years he has been growing corn and beans. Like all farmers he puts much determination into his work to get a good harvest and to later put it up for sale. In this way he can generate the income need for his household. Francisco is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in compost, herbicides, fertilizer and pest control and in this way continue with his work as it is his only source of income.

loans.use: to invest in compost, herbicides, fertilizer and pest control.

loans.name: Selarde

texts.en:
Selarde is 52 years old and has three children. She is married and has one child who is still in school.

Selarde is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Selarde has been in pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Selarde would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Genara

texts.en:
Genara is 51 years old and has three children. She is married and has two children who are still in school.

Genara is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables and bananas in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Genara has been farming vegetables and bananas for three years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Genara would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Visitacion

texts.en:
Visitacion works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Visitacion requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

Visitacion has been in this business for two years now.

In the future, Visitacion would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Benkola Group

texts.fr:
Kadidiatou est la femme qui tient la daba et la tasse remplie en main au bout sur la photo
une femme  malienne âgée  de 45 ans, mariée, son mari  cultive pour gagner  sa vie, mère de 4 enfants  dont 1 garçon et 3 filles, 1 est scolarisé.
Les rêves et les espoirs de kadidiatou  sont : satisfaire  les besoins d’ étudier ses enfants et acheter les animaux pour l’avenir de mes enfants.
Kadidiatou  a été à l’école  arrêta  en 7 année  en raison de vivoter de la famille.
Elle fait recourt  au RMCR à cause  de la  pauvreté et l’indigent. 
Elle achète les semences dans les différents marchés et revend dans les mêmes  lieux.
En semant  d’arachide  et que il pleuve  abondamment  elle pourra gagner des kgs.
elle emploiera le prêt dans les cultures  d’arachides et nous croyons que ce prêt l’ aidera à disparaitre  la pauvreté. Cette activité la plait  parce que elle est habitué  à sa depuis nos enfances.
Les obstacles soulignés est la sècheresse  et les singes.
texts.en: Kadidiatou is the woman holding a "daba" hand tool and the filled bowl to the right of the photo. A 45-year old married mother from Mali, she and her husband earning a living through farming. They have had four children together, one boy and three girls. One of their children is currently receiving an education. Kadidiatou's hopes and dreams are to satisfy her children's educational needs and to purchase animals for her children's future. She only attended seven years of school because she had to work to help support her family. She has turned to RMCR because she is poverty-stricken and destitute. She purchases seeds at different markets and sells the produce in these same places. By growing peanuts, and when there is an abundance of rain, she'll be able to harvest many kilos of crops. She will use this loan in order to grow peanuts and we believe that this will help her get out of poverty. She enjoys this activity because she has been doing it since she was a child. The obstacles she is faced with are droughts and monkeys.

loans.use: to purchase seeds for their field

loans.name: Maria Irene

texts.es: Doña María de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su nieta, ella se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, una actividad en la que posee mucha experiencia, Doña María posee una parcela la cual es propicia para la siembra, la que le permite contar con muy buenas cosechas, lo que desea aprovechar al máximo duplicando la cantidad de maíz y frijol que siembra, por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL y de esta forma comprar semillas para sembrar, abono y pesticida y asi poder continuar con sus siembras para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Doña María, age 54, lives in her own home with her two children and her granddaughter. She plants corn and beans, a job in which she has a lot of experience. Doña María owns a parcel that is conducive to cultivation, which provides her with very good harvests that she hopes to maximize by increasing the amount of corn and beans that she plants. That is why she is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL, to buy seeds to plant, fertilizer, and pesticide. In this way she can continue her plantings and give her family greater economic stability.

loans.use: buy seeds to plant, fertilizer, and pesticide.

loans.name: Epouses Des Enseignants"gie Yokouté 3" Group

texts.fr:
Le groupement « Epouses des enseignants, GIE Yokouté3  vient pour la première fois  solliciter un crédit pour permettre à ses membres d’améliorer un peu leurs activités respectives.  
Madame Anna représente la chef de groupe, elle s’active dans le commerce depuis 5 ans en vendant des produits cosmétiques et du jus de fruit. Anna a 38 ans, mariée mais n’a pas encore d’enfants.  Elle possède une boutique non loin de  chez elle ce qui lui permet  de rester active toute la journée.  Grâce au crédit, elle pourra acheter du sucre, du pain de singe et des ingrédients pour la fabrication des jus. Elle va aussi acheter des produits cosmétiques : parfum, lait pour le corps, savon, shampoing...
Madame Anna veut améliorer davantage son commerce et mieux faire connaitre ses produits.
texts.en: This is the first time the Epouses Des Enseignants"Gie Yokouté 3" Group has requested a loan to allow to its members to grow their respective activities. Anna is the group leader. She has been selling cosmetic products and fruit juice for five years. Anna is 38 years old and married, but she doesn't yet have any children. She owns a stall not far from her home which allows her to stay active all day long. Thanks to this loan, she will be able to purchase sugar, baobab fruit and the necessary ingredients for making fruit juice. She will also purchase cosmetic products: perfume, body lotions, soap, shampoo... Anna wants to further improve her business and make her wares better known.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products for resale

loans.name: Rajabmoh

texts.en:
Rajabmoh is a cheerful woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1962. She is living in Tagoyobod village with her family. She is married to a teacher and has one child.  For almost five years as she has been in business in agriculture. She is busy with planting cotton, vegetables and grain crops. She is well known among friends and neighbors. 

The season of planting this year's harvest is coming and she is planning to plant seeds of cotton, grain crops and vegetables. She is requesting a loan from IMON and Kiva to buy seeds for planting. She is hoping to be supported by Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy seeds of cotton, grain crops and vegetables

loans.name: Ritchel

texts.en:
Ritchel is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ritchel is 38 years old and has one child who is in school.

Ritchel has a buy and sell ready to wear business in the Philippines. Ritchel requested a PHP 16000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional stocks of ready to wear to sell to her customers.

Ritchel has been in this business for 5 years. Ritchel would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of ready to wear to sell to her customers

loans.name: Ligaya

texts.en:
Ligaya is 42 years old and has one child. Ligaya is married and has one children who are in school.

She is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Ligaya requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Ligaya has been raising pigs for 44 years now, and has borrowed 8 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Ligaya would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Zeineth

texts.en:
Zeineth is 53 years old, married and has five children. 

Zeineth is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Zeineth requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Zeineth has been raising pigs for six years now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Zeineth would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is 54 years old, married with five children.

Daisy works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store.

Daisy has borrowed and paid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 3 years and also earns an income from fruits vending.

Daisy aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is 49 years old and married with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Yolanda has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stock like noodles, cereals, bread, eggs, soft drinks, coffee, etc. to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Yolanda has been in this business for 13 years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock like noodles, cereals, bread, eggs, soft drinks, coffee, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan de 41 años de edad se dedica desde hace 20 años a la agricultura y también trabaja en una empresa privada, vive con sus dos hijos en casa propia, con lo que obtiene de sus trabajos logra salir adelante, el quiere mejorar su vivienda repellando las paredes y cambiando las puertas, pero como no posee de suficiente capital está solicitando un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, balcones, puertas y pago de mano de obra y así el y su familia tendrán una vivienda digna más segura y cómoda.
texts.en: Juan, age 41, has worked for the past 20 years in agriculture, and also works for a private company.  He lives with his two sons in his own home. With the jobs he gets, he is able to get ahead.  He wants to improve his house, plastering the walls and changing out the doors. But, as he lacks sufficient funds, he is requesting a loan for the purchase of cement, sand, thresholds, and labor. He and his family will then have a more secure, comfortable, and dignified dwelling.

loans.use: purchase cement, sand, thresholds, doors, and pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es: Luis de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia sus tres hijos, él se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino y a la agricultura desde hace 10 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa y con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de toretes para engordar y asi continuar con la crianza y asi tener mejores ingresos económicos para tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Luis, 35 years old, lives with his three children in a house he owns. He has worked raising cattle and in agriculture for the past 10 years. He sells his products in the various markets that are near his house and, with the earnings that he gets, he manages to pay some of the household expenses. He is asking for a loan to purchase young beef bulls to fatten, and in this way, continue with raising them and to have more income to have a better quality of life with his family.

loans.use: to purchase young beef bulls to fatten.

loans.name: Guldasta

texts.en:
Guldasta is a hardworking woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1970.  Guldasta lives in a remote district with her family. She is married and has four children. Her husband is a constructor and works seasonally under orders of clients. 

Guldusta has four years of working experience as a cleaning woman and also as a tailor. She sews traditional women dresses and has regular customers. Guldusta is planning to keep livestock for additional income. She applied to get a loan from IMON and KIVA lenders to buy livestock. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
Her name is Josefa, 51, single and resident of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. She has a travel and tours business and laundry shop to support herself and her parents' living expense.

Josefa operates a variety store. Coron is one the most popular and beautiful island in he Philippines. It offers the most amazing beaches and marine life in Palawan and is the most visited tourist spot of both foreigner and local tourists. Josefa made the best of opportunity to establish a travel and tours business to serve the travel needs of tourists, who often take their vacation in Coron island. She earns a minimum net income of Php 1000 a day. 

To help her continue the operation of her business, she is requesting a Php 10000 loan which she will use to pay for the cost of renovation her travel agency office. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her for it will help better serve and attract more clients. Her earnings will surely help cover their daily sustenance and save for her old age.  

Josefa prays that God will continue to bless her business and grant her and parents good health and long life. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for the renovation of her travel and tours office to better serve her clients.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a married woman, with 5 children. She describes herself to be self driven. She operates a farm where she grows rice. Her business is located in a productive area. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient working capital. 

She will use the Kes 100,000 loan to buy fertilizer, seeds, pesticides and pay farm labor costs. She hopes that in the future, she will be able to hire more land for rice farming. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance bank.  Her previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy fertilizer, seeds, pesticides and pay farm labor costs

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Jessica works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Jessica is borrowing PHP 11000 through NWTF to purchase of additional fishing nets for her fishing business.

Jessica has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing nets

loans.name: Necil

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Necil works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell rice business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling ready to wear.  Necil is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice to sell for her buy and sell rice business.

Necil has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Basilisa

texts.en:
Basilisa works hard to support her family. She is widowed and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Basilisa requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store.

Basilisa has been in this business for six years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Basilisa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is 36 years old and married with two children who are in school, Joyce works very hard to provide for them.

Joyce runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 500000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell .

Joyce has been in this business for 10 years. 

In the future Joyce would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell

loans.name: Emelita

texts.en:
Emelita is 53 years old and married with four children, one of whom in school, Emelita works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar etc.

Emelita has been in this business for 19 years.

In the future Emelita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar etc

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.en:
Felicitas is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Felicitas is 53 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Felicitas has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Felicitas requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall.

Felicitas has been in this business for 15 years. Felicitas would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Marisa

texts.en:
Marisa is a married woman, 39 years old with one child. She is a very hard  working entrepreneur.

Marisa has a food vending business in the Philippines. Marisa requested a PHP 10500 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, fish, spices, vegetables, cooking oil and other utensils for her food production business.

Marisa has been in this business for 6 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, fish, spices, vegetables, cooking oil and other utensils for her food production business

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard  working entrepreneur. Geraldine is 28 years old and has two children who are in school.

Geraldine has a food vending business in the Philippines. Geraldine requested a PHP 26000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like spices, meat, fish, vegetables, rice, etc.  for her food vending business.

Geraldine has been in this business for 10 years.  In the future, Geraldine would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like spices, meat, fish, vegetables, rice, etc.  for her food vending business

loans.name: Badenya-Ton Group

texts.fr:
Yaya est le Monsieur  qui  tient la corne du bélier sur la photo.
Yaya est  un  malien  non scolarisé. Il est âgé de  36 ans, marié Père de 09 enfants, âgés de 4 mois à  12 ans dont 3 sont  scolarisés. Sa femme est une ménagère. 
Yaya  fait  l’élevage des béliers. Il prend le prêt avec le RMCR pour acheter  beaucoup  de béliers. Il s’approvisionne  dans  les foires environnantes  et revend dans les foires lointaines.   Il  a une expérience de 12 ans  d’activité.
 Dans ses ventes, il gagne en moyenne  15000 FCFA de profit par Béliers. Avec le profit, Yaya pourra subvenir aux besoins de sa famille (habillement, santé, frais de condiments).  Il est souvent confronté aux  couts élevé  des frais de transport   mais organise généralement  le voyage avec  certains éleveurs  de sa localité pour relever le défi.
Dans l’avenir  Yaya veut  un prêt beaucoup plus  élevé pour développer son  activité et gagner plus de profit afin de s’acheter un terrain en ville à usage d’habitation pour sa  famille.
texts.en: Yaya is the man holding the ram by the horn in the photo. Yaya is from Mali. He didn't receive an education growing up. He is a 36-year-old married father to nine children, aged between four months and 12 years old. Three of his children are currently receiving an education. His partner is a housewife. Yaya raises rams. He is taking out this loan with RMCR in order to purchase many rams. He gets his livestock from the local markets and resells them at further-flung markets. He has 12 years of experience in this field. Through selling his livestock, he earns an average profit of 15,000 FCFA per ram. With these profits, Yaya will be able to meet his family's needs (clothing, health costs, food costs). He often has to deal with increased transportation costs, but he generally organises his trips along with other local livestock farmers in order to work around this. In the future, Yaya would like a larger loan in order to further develop his business and earn larger profits so he can purchase a plot of land in his village and use it to build a family home.

loans.use: to purchase rams for resale

loans.name: Mirvat

texts.en:
Mirvat is a 49-year-old married mother of two children, who has been working as a tailor from her house for the past 18 years. She is a hard working woman who puts so much effort into supporting her beloved family, and improving their social and financial situation. 

Mirvat is trying hard to provide her family with a better life; thus she is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua, to pay her daughter's increasing university tuition fees in addition to her other child's school tuition fees.

Her income combined with her husband's income are barely enough to cover their increasing living needs, but their main focus is their children's education so they can obtain a brighter future.

Mirvat has been an Al Majmoua borrower for three consecutive cycles. Her previous loans helped her significantly in paying for her children education expenses, and developing her business.  She has proved to be a borrower in good standing.

Mirvat hopes that one day she can open her own tailoring shop to make her dream come true and improve her family's living.

loans.use: To pay her daughter's increasing university tuition fees in addition to her other child's school tuition fees

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 33 years old and married with three children.  She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. 

Gloria is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.  Gloria has been raising pig for three years and also earns additional income from farming rice.

Gloria successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream -- to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Consolacion

texts.en:
Consolacion is 33 years old and a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Consolacion has a business direct selling Avon and MSE products in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more products from Avon and MSE to sell to her customers.

Consolacion has been in this business for six years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more products from Avon and MSE to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
Elvira works hard to support her family. Elvira is widowed with seven children and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Elvira requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy materials like fish net, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

Elvira has been in this business for 32 years now.  She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials like fish net, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.en:
Gregoria is 43 years old and has three children. She is married and has three children who are in school.

Gregoria is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and other supplies for her pigs.

Gregoria has been in pig fattening for 23 years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Gregoria would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed and other supplies for her pigs.

loans.name: Felicidad

texts.en:
Felicidad is 53 years old and married.

Felicidad runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional grocery items to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, eggs, cooking oil and other personal care products.

Felicidad has been in this business for ten years.  She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery items to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, eggs, cooking oil and other personal care products

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is a 40-year-old married woman with four children, three of whom are currently in school.

Rowena is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Rowena has been raising pigs for three years now, and has borrowed once in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Rowena would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 47 years old and married with four children. Three children are currently in school.  Josephine works very hard to provide for them.

Josephine runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,500 loan through NWTF to purchase additional grocery items to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, eggs, cooking oil and other personal care products.

Josephine has been in this business for four years.  She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery items to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, eggs, cooking oil and other personal care products

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 66 years old, married and has five children.

Elizabeth is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Elizabeth requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Elizabeth has been in this business for 20 years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.  She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a married woman with three children. She describes herself as dynamic. Joyce operates a retail business where she sells flour, sugar, bread and other items. She has been involved in this business for eight years. 

Joyce's business is located in a good area. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds. She will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy more stock of flour, sugar, bread, soap and other items. Her business goal is to have a wholesale business within five years. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy more stock of flour, sugar, bread, soap and other items

loans.name: Emelyn

texts.en:
Emelyn works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to purchase boxes of fish to sell.

Emelyn has been in this business for one year now.

In the future, Emelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a married woman and lives with her husband and two children. She owns a house that has neither electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past three years, she has operated a charcoal selling business. She sells from home to her neighbours and passersby. Her major challenge is the high cost of transportation. 
With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase bundles of charcoal for resale. She decided to join to Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of charcoal for resale

loans.name: Ellen

texts.en:
Ellen is 34 years old, married and has one child in school.  

She is in the agricultural business raising pig in the Philippines. Ellen requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Ellen has been raising pig for 3 years now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Ellen would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is 27 years old and has two children. She is married and both of her children are in school.

Janet is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Janet requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Janet has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed 8 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Janet would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Maricel is 32 years old and has one child who is in school.

Maricel has a food and fruits vending business in the Philippines. Maricel requested a PHP 20000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase ingredients and more fruits for her business.

Maricel has been in this business for 3 years. Maricel would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients and more fruits for her business

loans.name: Oscar Mauricio

texts.es: Oscar de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, él se dedica a la crianza de ganado y cerdo desde hace 20 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa y con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de más cerdos y alimento para continuar con la crianza ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Oscar, 32 years old, lives with his wife and their two children in a house he owns. He has worked raising cattle and pigs for the past 20 years. He sells his products in the various markets that are near his house and with the earnings that he gets, he manages to cover some of the household expenses. He is asking for a loan to purchase more pigs and feed to continue raising them since this is his only source of work, and in this way have more income.

loans.use: to purchase more pigs and feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, concrete blocks, metal and pay labor costs to build a retaining wall to protect his house.

loans.name: Javier Alexander

texts.es:
Javier, de 30 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, debido a los escasos recursos de sus padres, está casado y junto a su esposa han procreado dos hijos y su esposa se dedica al comercio informal de compra y venta de ropa.

Javier, se dedica a la pesca artesanal, trabajo que le enseñó su padre cuando estaba muy pequeño, para que tuviera una fuente de ingreso, la pesca la realiza en una laguna, que se encuentra a un kilómetro de su casa, le ayuda a su hermano y se dividen las ganancias para cubrir las necesidades básicas del hogar, esta función la hace por las mañanas.

Javier, necesita el crédito para construir un pequeño cuarto, ya que la familia está creciendo y la casa es pequeña.

El sueño de Javier, es sacar adelante a sus hijos, para que tengan mejores oportunidades en el futuro, así mismo terminar la construcción de su casa para vivir mas cómodos.
texts.en:
Javier, 30 years old, went to school up to the ninth grade, due the his parents' limited resources. He is married and with his wife has two children and his wife works in informal sales buying and selling clothing.

Javier works in traditional fishing, work that his father taught him when he was very little, so that he would have a source of income. The fishing is done in a lake, which is a kilometer from his house. His brother helps him and they divide the earnings to cover the basic household necessities. He does this in the mornings.

Javier needs the loan to build a small room, since his family is growing and the house is small.

Javier's dream is to get his children ahead, so that they have better opportunities in the future, and also to finish building the house to live more comfortably.

loans.use: to build a small room.

loans.name: Flordeliz

texts.en:
Flordeliz is 50 years old and has three children. Flordeliz is married and one of her children is still in school.

Flordeliz is in the agricultural business, raising poultry in the Philippines. Flordeliz requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her chickens.

Flordeliz has been in this business for six years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and other supplies to raise her chickens

loans.name: Jose Fernando

texts.es:
José, trabaja todos los días como empleado en un hotel, al finalizar su jornada laboral se dedica a sacar y a vender curiles, además práctica la crianza de pollos, sus esfuerzos son para lograr tener mejores ingresos y poder cumplir con sus responsabilidades; vive con su compañera de vida y un hijo, todos dependen del trabajo de don José.
Para tener en mejores condiciones la granja está solicitando un crédito con el que podrá comprar concentrado y vitaminas para los pollos, además reparara la motocicleta en la que se traslada hacia su trabajo, se esforzará en mejorar su negocio y seguirá mantenido la puntualidad en su trabajo, espera que los resultados sean positivos y tenga mejores ingresos.
Sus deseos son cancelar su deuda, construir su vivienda de ladrillo y darle a su familia todo lo que necesiten.
texts.en:
José works every day as an employee at a hotel. At the end of his work day, he works harvesting and selling curil shells, in addition he raises chickens. His efforts are to manage to have more income and be able to fulfill his responsibilities. He lives with his life partner and a child, all depend on José's work.

To have better conditions on the farm, he is asking for a loan with which he will be able to purchase concentrated chicken feed and vitamins, and also to do repairs on the motorcycle that he uses to get to work. He will work hard to improve his business and continue maintaining his punctuality at work. He hopes that the results will be positive and he will have more income. 

His desires are to pay off his debt, build a brick house, and give his family everything they need.

loans.use: to purchase concentrated chicken feed and vitamins, and also to repair the motorcycle he uses to get to work.

loans.name: Rosa Gladis

texts.es:
María, de 42 años de edad, no estudio, tiene 2 hijos, está casada, pero su esposo decidió viajar a E.E.U.U. con el fin de mejorar los ingresos económicos de la familia, antes le ayudaba, pero hoy en día ya no los apoyo; ella trabaja duro para poder darle el estudio a sus dos hijos, ya que uno está en bachillerato y el otro en educación básica.    

María, tiene 12 años de trabajar vendiendo tortillas, de esa manera obtiene los ingresos para cubrir las necesidades de su familia. 

El dinero lo necesita para comprar un carretón para vender papas con queso y de esa manera poder obtener ingresos adicionales.

Ella sueña con ver a sus hijos convertidos en profesionales y además desea colocar una tienda para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
María is 42 years old and did not have a formal education. She has two children and is married.  However, her husband decided to travel to the United States in order to improve his income for his family. He used to help them financially, but he no longer supports them.  She works hard in order to provide her two children with an education, as one is in high school and the other is in primary school.  

María has 12 years of experience selling tortillas, which allows her to earn enough to cover her family's needs.  She is in need of money to purchase a cart so that she can sell potatoes with cheese and supplement her income.  She dreams of seeing her children become professionals, as well as opening a store so that she can increase her earnings.

loans.use: purchase a cart to sell potatoes with cheese.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a married man. He describes himself to be loyal. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds.
