loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy condiments

loans.name: Puthy

texts.en:
Puthy (here in photo) is 45 years old, lives at Khsach Kandal district, Kandal province. Cambodia.  She had been married since 1996 and has two sons and one daughter. One of her children is married, two are still young.

Puthy has been a weaver for 9 years, while her husband has been a farmer for 20 years.  Currently her house so old, so she would like to apply for a loan to repair her house. She wants to have a better house.

loans.use: To repair her house.

loans.name: Epouses Des Enseignants" And Liggey3" Group

texts.fr:
Le groupement Epouses des enseignants "And liggey3 " rassemble cinq femmes qui s’activent dans le commerce, elles pratiquent la même activité. Elles vont bénéficier  d’un appui financier à travers un partenariat établi entre l’UIMCEC et leur Association. 
La présidente s’appelle Awa, elle est âgée de 24 ans, mariée et mère de famille. Elle vend des produits cosmétiques il y a maintenant 2 ans. Awa a démarré avec un capital de 30 000milles avec lesquels, elle a acheté des parfums, des lotions pour le corps, du savon et autres produits de beauté pour revendre. Elle place sa marchandise chez sa clientèle à crédit et repasse récupérer l’argent une semaine après. Depuis lors, elle a développé  son capital et en est à 150 000f actuellement. 
Son vœu serait d’ouvrir un magasin de vente de produits cosmétiques pour  développer son commerce.
texts.en:
The group "And liggey3" of teachers' wives brings together five women who are active in business, and practice the same activity. They will receive financial support through a partnership between their association and UIMCEC.

The president named Awa is 24 years old, and a married mother. She has been selling cosmetics for the past two years. Awa started with a capital of 30,000 francs with which she bought perfumes, body lotions, soap and other beauty products for resale.

She delivers her products at the customer's home on credit, and returns to collect the money a week later. She has since then increased her working capital to 150,000 francs.

Her wish is to open a cosmetics shop to develop her business.

loans.use: buy cosmetics for resale

loans.name: Hiba

texts.en: Hiba is a 43-year-old single Lebanese woman living with her husband, and three children who are all attending school. Due to the bad financial conditions, she cooperates with her husband who is their main income provider to fulfill the family needs. Hiba opened a clothing shop in 2007, where she offers a great variety of clothes for men and women at good prices. Today, she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase a new collection of clothes so that she can improve her business operations and follow up on the new fashions. In this way, she will be able to increase her sales and thus her revenues.

loans.use: to purchase a new collection of clothes.

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Salvacion works hard to support her family.

She has a pig fattening business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Salvacion is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Salvacion has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.en:
Tomasa is 66 years old and married with four children.  

Tomasa is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Tomasa requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Tomasa has been in pig fattening for 40 years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Tomasa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Joralyn

texts.en:
Joralyn is a hardworking woman and entrepreneur.

She runs a charcoal-vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional stocks of charcoal to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like poultry.

Joralyn dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Erna

texts.en:
Erna is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy an additional bundle of fishing net for her fishing business.

Erna has been in this business for six years. Erna earns more income from her general store.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Erna has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy an additional bundle of fishing net

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is 46 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Nora is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to purchase vitamins, feeds and vaccines for her business. She has been in pig fattening for 10 years, and she also earns additional income from a general store.

Nora is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream, which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins, feeds and vaccines for her business

loans.name: Elin

texts.es: Elin, tiene 42 años de edad, esta soltero, vive con su madre y sobrino en una aldea que pertenece a San Luis, Santa Bárbara. Elin siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, su mayor producción y lo que le genera ingresos es el cultivo de café, el cual vende en la zona y es café 90. Además el trabaja como jornalero en temporadas para obtener otros ingresos. Esta solicitando un préstamo por 10,000 lempiras para compra de insumos y fertilizantes para aplicarle a su finca de café y poder sacar mejor producción. Su plan es comprar mas terrenos para cosechar mas café y seguir adelante ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
Elin is 42 years old, single, and lives with his mother and nephew in a town located in San Luis, Santa Bárbara. Elin has always worked in agriculture. His best produce and what generates income is coffee, which he sells in the zone. It is 90-point coffee.

In addition, he works as a day laborer seasonally to earn other income. 

He is asking for a loan of 10,000 lempiras to buy supplies and fertilizers to apply on his coffee farm and to be able to achieve better production. His plan is to buy more plots of land to plant more coffee and to continue helping his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers to apply on his coffee farm

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en:
Alaa is a 30-year-old single man who started in December 2012 his own business selling mobile phones and worked hard to develop it as much as he could through his acquired income.

Alaa is an ambitious man. Since his business income isn't that big and its development is based on this income, he decided to acquire a Youth loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase his business merchandise with newly-released mobile phones, accessories and prepaid cards to reply to his customers' needs.

He hopes that in the future, he can expand his working sector and cover nearby villages with the wholesale business he is willing to start.

loans.use: To increase his business merchandise with newly-released mobile phones, accessories and prepaid cards to reply to his customers' needs

loans.name: Nawale

texts.en:
Nawale is a 54-year-old married Lebanese woman living with her husband and two children, who are attending school. She is a housewife and she takes care of her children all the time. Her husband is the main income provider in the family, and he works as an employee in a company in order to help his beloved family to live in good circumstances. 

Today, given that her children will enter a school very soon, she is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner, Vitas s.a.l., to register them at the school. The parents’ only target is to provide their children with a good educational path until graduation.

loans.use: to register her children at a school

loans.name: Jenely

texts.en:
Jenely is 36 years old and married with seven children. Five of her children are sent to school.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Jenely is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Jenely has been raising pigs for 10 years and earns additional income from selling coconut wine.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Cristita

texts.en:
Cristita is 52 years old and married with nine children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Cristita is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

Cristita has been in pig fattening for seven years and earns additional income from her general store.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs

loans.name: Gorgonia

texts.en:
Gorgonia is 47 years old and single.

She is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock. She has been raising livestock for two years now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Gorgonia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Benkadi A Group

texts.fr:
Les  10 membres du groupe   BENKADI A sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 34 ans, 6 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Yelekela, un des villages de SIKASSO, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso enfin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur dixième prêt avec l’institution et les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide, avec madame Afoussatou  debout en première position de la gauche vers a droite sur la photo, elle compte acheter avec son prêt, des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir : 1 hectares. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, au marché de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et des femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 200.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi aider la grande famille dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Benkadi A group are married women who on average are 34 years with six children, all living in traditional families in Yelekela, one of the villages in Sikasso, the third administrative region of Mali.

They work with the Soro Yiriwaso micro-finance institution  in carrying out their agricultural activities during the rainy season. This is their tenth loan with the institution and the past loans were repaid in full.

The selected crop is groundnuts featuring Mrs. Afoussatou, who is standing in the first position from left to right in the photo. She intends to use her loan to buy agricultural inputs, seeds and pay plowing costs to maintain one hectare (2.44 acres)..

After harvest the production is sold in the village and in the Sikasso market, to a clientele composed of men and women. She expects to achieve an average profit of 200,000 CFA francs per crop season.

This profit will enable her to pay off her loan and also help the family with daily expenses.

loans.use: buy agricultural inputs and seeds, and pay for plowing

loans.name: Carolyne

texts.en:
Carolyne is a married woman and has been blessed with three children, all of whom attend school. Together with her husband, they live at their own house that has electricity but no piped water. 

She has been operating a fish selling business for over three years, selling from home to restaurant operators and passersby. She faces the major challenges of seasonality and perishability, leading to losses.

With the KES 40,000 she wants to purchase bundles of fish for resale. She dreams of expanding her business and establishing another business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish for resale

loans.name: Batma

texts.ru: Батма, 36 лет, замужем, 3 детей. У нее высшее образование, в качестве дополнительного дохода с 2005 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Батмы в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 5 коров, 20 овец. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса составляет 25,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 65,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для разведения. Доходы от кредита Батма планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и покупку мебели для дома.
texts.en: Batma is 36 years old, married, and she has three children.  She has a college education and, since 2005, she has been involved in animal husbandry as an additional source of income.  She started her business with 5,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has five cows and 20 sheep on her farm.  Thanks to her activity, she makes a monthly income of 25,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 65,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock for breeding.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further develop her business and to buy furniture for her house.

loans.use: to buy some livestock in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Dina

texts.en:
Dina is a 31-year-old married mother of three children. 

For the last ten years she has been working at her home selling home-made foods such as pickles, thyme, etc. to help her family to meet the needs of life and to support her husband financially. 

Dina is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner, Vitas s.a.l., to improve her business merchandise and give the best product to her clients, with the aim of increasing her income. She is really sure that she will be able to sell all her products and expand her business area, and thus increase her income. 

She hopes that in the future she can open her own store and attract more customers.

loans.use: to improve her business merchandise and offer the best home-made foods to her clients

loans.name: Benkadi B Group

texts.fr:
Les  10 membres du groupe  BENKADI B sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 35 ans, 6 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à YELEKELA, un des villages de SIKASSO, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso enfin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur dixième prêt avec l’institution et les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide, avec Djelika  Adama  assise au milieu sur la photo, elle compte acheter avec son prêt, des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir : 0;25 hectares.  
La production est vendue au niveau du village, au marché de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et des femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de105.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi aider la grande famille dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Benkadi B group are married women who on average are 35 years old with six children, all living in traditional families in Yelekela, one of the villages in Sikasso, the third administrative region of Mali.

They work with the Soro Yiriwaso micro-finance institution in carrying out their agricultural activities during the rainy season. This is their tenth loan with the institution and the past loans were repaid in full.

The selected crop is groundnuts featuring Djelika Adama, who is sitting in the middle of the photo. She intends to use her loan to buy agricultural inputs, seeds and pay plowing costs to maintain 0.25 hectares (0.62 acres).

After harvest the production is sold in the village and in the Sikasso market, to a clientele composed of men and women. She expects to achieve an average profit of 105,000 CFA francs per growing season.

This profit will enable her to pay off her loan and also help the larger family with daily expenses.

loans.use: buy agricultural inputs and seeds, and pay for plowing

loans.name: Burobiya

texts.ru: Буробия, 54 года, замужем, мать 4 детей. У нее высшее педагогическое образование. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Буробия уже 21 год занимается сельским хозяйством. В хозяйстве есть 2 коровы. На 0,61 Га земли Буробия выращивает морковь для реализации. Благодаря упорному труду, ее деятельность приносит 7,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян картофеля и удобрений для выращивания органических овощей. Доходы от кредита позволят Буробии развить ее бизнес и накопить на ремонт бани.
texts.en: Burobiya is 54 years old, married, and the mother of four children.  She has a teacher's education.  For the past 21 years, she has been involved in agriculture, an activity which constitutes her family's main source of income.  She has two cows on her farm.  She also grows carrots for resale on 0.61 hectares of land.  Thanks to her very hard work, she makes 7,000 som (KGS) every month.  In order to further grow her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy seed potatoes and fertilizers to grow organic vegetables.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further develop her business.  She also wants to save enough money to renovate her bathroom.

loans.use: to buy seed potatoes and fertilizers to grow organic vegetables.

loans.name: Jose Arturo

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, todos dependen de los ingresos que don José genera, él brinda el servicio de sastre en su localidad oficio que aprendió mediante preparación académica y lo desempeña desde hace más de 20 años, no tiene un horario establecido.
Su negocio requiere de un mejor equipo de trabajo por lo que se decidió a solicitar un crédito para comprar una máquina de coser, telas, botones, hilos, etc., esta inversión le será de ayuda para brindar mejor calidad y puntualidad en su negocio, espera dar un mejor servicio y no representa riesgos debido a que la mercadería es larga duración.
Sus sueños son establecer un bazar para vender materiales de costura y otros productos para ir ampliando su negocio.
texts.en:
Jose lives with his wife and two children who depend on his income.  He is a tailor, craft which he learned through academic preparation and has been carrying out for more than 20 years.  He does not have a set work schedule.  
His business requires better work equipment which is the reason why he is requesting a loan to buy a sewing machine, fabrics, buttons, threads, etc.  This investment will help him improve the quality and timeliness of his work.  He hopes to give a better service and it doesn't represent any risks because the merchandise can be kept long term.  
His dream is to establish a bazaar to sell sewing materials and other products to continue expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, fabrics, buttons, threads, etc.  This investment will will help him improve his the quality and timeliness of his work.

loans.name: Merline

texts.fr:
Merline est une femme dynamique de 37ans. Elle vit avec son mari et leurs deux petits enfants de 5 et 11 ans dans une maison encore en location. La famille désire avoir sa propre maison et les parents s’efforce de travailler dur chaque jour pour pouvoir en construire un jour.
Son mari est maçon tâcheron et Merline exerce une activité de vente de pommes de terre, il y a maintenant 4 ans.
Rappelons que les pommes de terres font parties des légumes le plus demandés dans le pays. Les pommes de terres frites, macédoines de légumes, etc... sont les plats plus adorés de toutes les générations. Merline arrive à vendre 150 kg de pommes de terre au minimum chaque jour. Elle a des clients fixes.
Pour pouvoir réaliser son rêve d'offrir une meilleur condition de vie à sa famille et de construire sa propre maison, elle voudrait encore et encore développer et améliorer son activité.
texts.en:
Merline is a dynamic 37-year-old woman. She lives with her husband and their two children (5 and 11 years old) in a house that they rent. 

The family would like to have their own home. The parents work hard every day so that they can one day build their own home. 

Merline’s husband is a bricklayer and Merline has been selling potatoes for four years. Potatoes are one of the most popular foods in the country. Fried potatoes and diced mixed vegetables are the most-loved dishes for people of all ages. Merline sells at least 150kg of potatoes every day. She has regular customers. 

She would like to continually develop and improve her business in order to achieve her goals of improving her family's living conditions and building her own house.

loans.use: buy approximately 500kg of potatoes.

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.en:
Shahnoza is a clever woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1992. She is married and has a son, and she lives in a village with her family.

Shahnoza participated in a three-day training course provided by IMON to start-up clients. The course, “Women entrepreneur – achieve success”, gave her the necessary knowledge to start a business, and now she is planning to open a business sewing curtains. She also wants to educate other girls who are willing to learn how to sew curtains. 

Therefore she has asked for a loan from Kiva and IMON to buy sewing machines to start sewing curtains.

loans.use: to buy sewing machines to start sewing curtains

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Cecilia requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like peanuts, sugar, etc. for her food production business. She has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like peanuts, sugar, etc. for her food production business

loans.name: Erika Yesenia

texts.es: Erika de 34 años de edad es una madre soltera muy emprendedora que se ha esforzado  por sacar adelante a sus tres hijos dos niños de 8 y 12 años y una niña de 16 años de edad. Para sostener a sus hijos Erika se ha dedica a la prestar sus servicios domésticos en una pupusería, además cuenta con una venta de productos básicos en su hogar, por lo que se siente feliz de poder brindarles lo mejor que está en sus manos.  Erika en su casa no cuenta con un lugar adecuado para resguardar el agua de uso diario, además necesita construir el cuarto de baño, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, ladrillo, hierro, tubo, arena y mano de obra para construir la pila y el cuarto de baño.
texts.en:
Erika is a single mother of 34 years of age.  She's very entrepreneurial and has sacrificed to get ahead her three children, 2 sons of 8 and 12 years of age, and a daughter of 16 years of age.  To support her children she provides domestic services at a "pupuseria" (local food stand).  She also sells basic products at her house.  She's happy that she can provide her children with what she is able to.  
Erika does not have a proper space in her home to store the water for daily use and also needs to build a bathroom.  She's requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, brick, iron, tubes, sand, and labor expenses for the water storage and the bathroom.

loans.use: to invest in cement, brick, iron, tubes, sand, and labor expenses for the water storage and the bathroom.

loans.name: Johannes

texts.en:
Johannes is a seasoned entrepreneur having successfully operated a tuck shop in his neighborhood. 

The 43-year-old is now looking to expand his business by opening a butchery. He says he has identified a gap in meat and chicken supplies within his area and has thus decided to fill that gap.
 
Johannes is requesting a Kiva loan to buy a food warmer, a 6-burner gas range with grill, and an anvil. He also wants to buy a popcorn machine for his tuck shop. 

This equipment will help Johannes kick-start his butchery business and add value to his existing business.

loans.use: to buy a food warmer (glass display), a 6-burner gas range, an anvil, and a popcorn machine.

loans.name: Benkadi D Group

texts.fr:
Les  10 membres du groupe  Benkadi D sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 36 ans, 6 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Yelekela, un des villages de SIKASSO, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso enfin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur dixième prêt avec l’institution et les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide, avec Fatoumata assise au milieu  sur la photo, elle compte acheter avec son prêt, des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir : 1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et des femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 180.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi aider la grande famille dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Benkadi D group are married women who on average are 36 years old with six children, all living in traditional families in Yelekela, one of the villages in Sikasso, the third administrative region of Mali.

They work with the Soro Yiriwaso micro-finance institution in carrying out their agricultural activities during the rainy season. This is their tenth loan with the institution and the past loans were repaid in full.

The selected crop is groundnuts featuring Fatoumata, who is sitting in the middle of the photo. She intends to use her loan to buy agricultural inputs, seeds and pay plowing costs to maintain one hectare (2.44 acres).

After harvest the production is sold in the village and in the Sikasso market, to a clientele composed of men and women. She expects to achieve an average profit of 180,000 CFA francs per growing season.

This profit will enable her to pay off her loan and also help the larger family with daily expenses.

loans.use: buy agricultural inputs and seeds, and pay for plowing

loans.name: Benkadi C Group

texts.fr:
Les  10 membres du groupe  BENKADI C sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 36 ans, 6 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Yelekela, un des villages de SIKASSO, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso enfin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur dixième prêt avec l’institution et les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide avec Marietou Bourama assise en deuxième  position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo, elle compte acheter avec son prêt, des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir : 1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, au marché de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et des femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen  195 000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi aider la grande famille dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Benkadi C group are married women who on average are 36 years old with six children, all living in traditional families in Yelekela, one of the villages in Sikasso, the third administrative region of Mali.

They work with the Soro Yiriwaso micro-finance institution in carrying out their agricultural activities during the rainy season. This is their tenth loan with the institution and the past loans were repaid in full.

The selected crop is groundnuts featuring Marietou Bourama, who is sitting in the second position from right to left in the photo. She intends to use her loan to buy agricultural inputs, seeds and pay plowing costs to maintain one hectare (2.44 acres).

After harvest the production is sold in the village and in the Sikasso market, to a clientele composed of men and women. She expects to achieve an average profit of 195,000 CFA francs per growing season.

This profit will enable her to pay off her loan and also help the larger family with daily expenses.

loans.use: buy agricultural inputs and seeds, and pay for plowing

loans.name: Gudafreda

texts.en:
Gudafreda is 44 years old and married with four children.

Gudafreda works hard to provide for her family. She has been running a general store in the Philippines for 8 years and also earns income from raising pigs. She requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, such as biscuits, candies, canned goods, soft drinks, beer, coffee, and cereals.

Gudafreda has borrowed and repaid 14 previous loans from NWTF. 

Gudafreda aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, such as biscuits, candies, canned goods, soft drinks, beer, coffee, and cereals.

loans.name: Benkadi E Group

texts.fr:
Les  9 membres du groupe  Benkadi E sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 34 ans, 6 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Yelekela, un des villages de SIKASSO, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso enfin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur dixième prêt avec l’institution et les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide, avec AMINATA assise en deuxième position de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo, elle compte acheter avec son prêt, des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir : 1 hectare.
La production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et des femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 195.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi aider la grande famille dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The nine members of the Benkadi E group are married women who on average are 34 years old with six children, all living in traditional families in Yelekela, one of the villages in Sikasso, the third administrative region of Mali.

They work with the Soro Yiriwaso micro-finance institution in carrying out their agricultural activities during the rainy season. This is their tenth loan with the institution and the past loans were repaid in full.

The selected crop is groundnuts featuring Aminata, who is sitting in the second position from left to right in the photo. She intends to use her loan to buy agricultural inputs, seeds and pay plowing costs to maintain one hectare (2.44 acres).

After harvest the production is sold in the village and in the Sikasso market, to a clientele composed of men and women. She expects to achieve an average profit of 195,000 CFA francs per growing season.

This profit will enable her to pay off her loan and also help the larger family with daily expenses.

loans.use: buy agricultural inputs and seeds, and pay for plowing

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana, tiene demandas más altas de sus servicios de cosmetóloga, está solicitado un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en esmaltes, cosméticos, tintes, tratamientos para el cabello, etc., surtirá el inventario del salón de belleza para contar con clientes satisfechos e ingresos fijos.
Ha Ana el préstamo anterior le sirvió para que su negocio se mantenga en el mercado, sus clientes están recibiendo un mejor servicio y ella tiene mejores ingresos que le ayudan a  tener un estilo de vida más digno.
texts.en:
Ana has a higher demand for her cosmetology services and is requesting a new loan to invest it in nail polish, cosmetics, hair dyes and treatments, etc. which will stock her beauty salon enabling her to keep her clients satisfied and have a fixed income.  
Ana used the previous loan to keep her business operating successfully.  Her clients are receiving a better service and she has a better income which allows her to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in nail polish, cosmetics, hair dyes and treatments, etc. which will stock her beauty salon.

loans.name: Lerma

texts.en:
Lerma buys fish in villages and sells it in the market. She has been running this business for three years, and she hopes to maintain and expand the business. 

Lerma requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy more fish to sell. She believes that by selling more fish, she can make more profit. Lerma hopes to earn more for the future of her child, whom she is now sending to school.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a dried fish making business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to purchase an additional box of fish to sell for her dried fish making business.

Gemma has been in this business for seven years. Gemma earns more income from buying and selling fish.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase an additional box of fish to sell

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is thankful that she was granted a 10,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase various grocery items and products needed in her General Store. Through her earnings, she is able to meet her daily living expense. 

She would now like to apply for a 15,000 PHP loan, which she will use to buy more quantities of grocery items like rice, coffee, soda, rice noodles, and frozen foods, which she sells at retail. She knows that more items in her store will yield more sales and thus increase her earnings. Her income from her store is a stable source to sustain her family's basic needs. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given to her. 

Merlinda dreams of having a bigger General Store and putting up one more store in the nearby town. She prays that God will bless the work of her hands and she will have her own house and lot someday. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which she studies.

 *All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages

loans.name: Katoni Group

texts.fr:
Baleke a hérité l'activité rizicole de ses parents. celle-ci l'aide à subvenir à ses besoins familiaux. Le moyen financier fait partie de conditions pour obtenir une meilleure production. Grâce à cela, il pourra relancer son projet de construction de maisons d'habitation.
Président du groupe KATONI, il tient sur la photo un carnet.
texts.en:
Baleke learned rice farming from his parents, and this helps him meet the needs of his family. 

Having enough money is one of the conditions required for growing more rice. It also will allow him to relaunch his home construction project. 

Baleke is the president of the Katoni group. He is pictured with a notebook in his hand.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and phytosanitary products, and pay for labor, upkeep, picking, and hoeing.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es: José de 36 años de edad es un hombre muy  que vive junto  a sus dos hijas de 6 y 5 años de edad a las que está sacando adelante solo. Él se dedica a compra y venta de ganado bovino la cual  realiza desde hace 10 años, por lo que cuenta con una gran experiencia en el negocio, el siempre quiere darles lo mejor a sus hijas como todo padre. José ha logrado construir un cuarto dormitorio para sus hijas, pero por falta de liquidez económica no ha logrado colocar ventanas, puertas y encementar el piso,  por lo que  solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, puertas y ventanas para instalar puertas, ventanas y encementar el piso del cuarto dormitorio.
texts.en:
Jose is 36 years old and lives with his two daughters of 5 and 6 years of age who he supports by himself.  He's been selling cattle for 10 years so he has a lot experience in the business.  He always wants to give his daughters the best, as any father would.
Jose was able to build a bedroom for his daughters but because of limited financial resources he has not been able to install windows, doors, or add concrete to the floor.  He's requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, doors and windows so he can install doors, windows and add concrete to the floor.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, doors and windows so he can install doors, windows and add concrete to the floor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, zinc sheets, wood, sand, and nails so she can build a better space to do her house chores.

loans.name: Jorja Agabel

texts.es:
Jorja, es una mujer luchadora que se dedica a elaborar pupusas para vender y además práctica la agricultura, cultiva granos básicos para consumo familiar y para su negocio, hizo la apertura de la pupusería hace cinco años, ella comenta que aprendió a desarrollar estas actividades con la ayuda de sus padres, vive con su esposo y su hijo de 14 años de edad, solo dos personas son las que dependen económicamente  de ella.
Necesita comprar una plancha mucho más grande para aumentar la producción de pupusas, contara con equipo apropiado para atender a sus clientes en menor tiempo y darles un servicio de calidad, espera tener una mejor economía familiar para disminuir las carencias que existen en su hogar.
El principal objetivo con el crédito es utilizarlo únicamente para mejorar su negocio y resarcirlo lo más pronto posible.
texts.en:
Jorja is a plucky woman who makes a living producing and selling “pupusas” (a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans). In addition she works in farming, growing basic grains for family consumption and for her business. Jorja opened her “pupusa” stall five years ago and says that she learned this work with the help of her parents. Jorja lives with her husband and 14-year-old son; these are the only two people who depend financially on Jorja.

Jorja needs to buy a much larger griddle in order to increase "pupusa" production. This will mean that she has the correct tools to serve her customers at a faster rate, and offer quality service. Jorja hopes to have a better financial situation at home in other reduce the number of things that her household lacks.

Jorja’s main objective for this loan is to use it to improve her business, and to repay the loan as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy a much larger griddle in order to increase "pupusa" production.

loans.name: Sandra Encarnación

texts.es:
Sandra, de 29 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora, con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo logro ingresar a estudiar en la universidad la carrera de Medicina Veterinaria, sin embargo aún no culmina sus estudios, está acompañada, pero su pareja vive en Estados Unidos, ella solo vive con su hijo.

Sandra, desde que su esposo se fue para el extranjero, decidió abrir un gimnasio, ya que ella disfruta mucho del ejercicio y porque en su comunidad no existe uno que le hiciera competencia, y es así que todos los días desde las 9:00 a.m. hasta 5:00 p.m. ella se dedica de atender a sus clientes que llegan a ejercitarse.

El préstamo solicitado es para remodelar su local, pues está un poco deteriorado y ya se acerca la época lluviosa y necesita que su gimnasio tenga buenas condiciones, por la seguridad de sus clientes.

El Sueño de Sandra, es abrir una clínica veterinaria, en la cual pueda ir creciendo económicamente y académicamente, pues le apasionan los animales y es la carrera que estudió, mientras su esposo regresa al país.
texts.en:
Sandra is an entrepreneurial 29 year old woman.  With a lot of work and effort she was able to get accepted to university to study veterinary medicine, degree in which she is still working on.  She has a partner but he lives in the United States so she lives with her son.  
Since her husband left she decided to open a gym because she enjoys exercising and because there was no gym in her neighborhood with which she would compete.  Everyday she works from 9AM to 5PM taking care of the clients that come to exercise.   
She's requesting the loan to remodel her gym which needs some improvement and with the rainy season approaching she needs the gym to be in good condition for the safety of her clients.  
Sandra's dream is to open a veterinary clinic so she can grow financially and acaemically since that is the career she prepared for, while she waits for her husband to come back to the country.

loans.use: to remodel her gym.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.en:
As a married parent of 11 children, Aurelia works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell of coconut shells business in the Philippines and earns additional income from pig fattening.  Aurelia is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of coconut shells to sell. 

Aurelia has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of coconut shells to sell

loans.name: Sreycheat

texts.en:
Sreycheat (shown in the photo) is 23 years old, single, and lives with her family in Dongkor district, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 

Nowadays, Sreycheat is a student who has studied at Vanda Institute in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. She is in the field of accounting, in her third year,  first semester.  She will graduate at the end of 2015.

She would like to apply for a loan to pay her school fees. She said that she wants to be a senior accountant.

loans.use: To pay for her school fees.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: Rigoberto de 33 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos varones de 8 años y 5 años, es un hombre honrado y trabajador que se ha esforzado por sacar adelante a su familia. Rigoberto desde hace 5 años se dedica a la venta de ganado bovino actividad que le ha permitido sostener a su familia y gracias a su espíritu emprendedor su negocio crece cada día más.  Rigoberto desea construir una galera en su vivienda, ya que actualmente solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina, cemento, arena, grava y polines para construir una galera en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Rigoberto is 33 years old and lives with his wife and two boys, ages eight and five years. Rigoberto is honest and hard-working. He has worked hard to help his family to get ahead. For five years, Rigoberto has made a living selling bovine cattle, a trade that has allowed him to support his family. His enterprising spirit helps his business to expand every day. 

Rigoberto wants to build a hall in his home. To carry out this work, he is applying for a loan from FUSAI so that he can invest in metal sheeting, cement, sand, gravel and purlins.

loans.use: to invest in metal sheeting, cement, sand, gravel and purlins in order to build a hall in his home.

loans.name: Senia Carolina

texts.es: Senia de 43 años de edad vive con sus dos hijos es madre soltera a falta del padre de sus hijos ella ha tenido que esforzarse para sacarlos adelante y darles educación. Senia hace 24 años se dedica  a la elaboración y venta de comida tiene un puesto en una zona con mucha afluencia de personas y vende panes con pollo y tortas de jamón las personas la prefieren por el exquisito sabor de sus productos, por esta razón ella solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: pollo panes francés, salchichas, jugos, sodas, jamón etc. para poder suplir las exigencias de sus clientes y así que su negocio crezca poco a poco para seguir brindando educación  necesaria a sus hijos también suplir las necesidades de su hogar y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Senia is a 43 year old single mother who lives with her 2 children.  Because of the absence of her children's father she's been working hard to get ahead her children and provide them with an education.  Senia has been cooking and selling food in her own food stall in an area with a lot of customers.  She sells chicken and ham sandwiches.  People prefer her food for the exquisite taste of her products.  
She's requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in chicken, french bread, sausages, juice, sodas, ham, etc. to keep meeting her clients demands.  She wants to keep growing the business slowly so she can keep providing the necessary education to her children and supply for the home needs, improving thus the quality of life of her children.

loans.use: to invest in chicken, french bread, sausages, juice, sodas, ham, etc.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en: Rita is a 47-year-old married woman living with her husband and four children. Her husband is the main source of income to satisfy the family's needs and to be able to live in a good lifestyle. She is dedicated only for her children. Today, in order to pay her children's university fees, she is applying for a new loan. She said that she is very happy and satisfied as she is able to pay their university fees and ensure they are able to pursue their education suitably.

loans.use: to pay her children's university fees

loans.name: Mery Asuncion

texts.es:
Mery tiene 24 años de edad, es soltera, con un hijo a su cargo, vive en casa familiar en el distrito de Oyotún, la cual es una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de esta comunidad se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales principalmente.

Ella se dedica a la venta de raspadilla y bebidas refrescantes preparadas por ella misma, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, realiza esta actividad desde hace 3 años y cuenta con bastante clientela de la zona. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de insumos para la elaboración de sus raspadillas y bebidas, esto con la finalidad de incrementar su negocio y satifacer las necesidades de sus clientes lo que le generará ingresos mayores que van a permitirle mejorar su nivel de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mery is 24 years old, single and has one son. She lives in her family home in the Oyotún district, a rural area in the Chiclayo province of the Lambayeque region on Peru’s northern coast. The locals here mainly make a living in farming, trade and breeding animals.

Mary herself makes a living refreshing ice-lollies and beverages that she herself prepares. Mery’s business is located in her home. She has been doing this work for three years and has a number of local customers. 

Mery is applying for a loan in order to buy a larger quantity of supplies in order to produce ice-lollies and beverages. She is applying for this loan in order to expand her business and satisfy her customers’ needs. This will allow Mery to earn a higher income and improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of supplies in order to produce ice-lollies and beverages.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: José, tiene 29 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos, reside en una aldea del municipio de San Sebastián, Lempira. José siempre se ha dedicado al cultivo de granos básicos de maíz y frijol, y hace mas de cinco años comenzó con el cultivo de café el cual le genera mayor ingreso. La cosecha la vende en pergamino, húmedo y seco en la zona. Está solicitando un préstamo por 20,000 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra para aplicarle a su finca de café para mejorar su cosecha y sus ganancias. Su reto es sembrar mas café para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 29 years old, married, with two children.  He lives in a village of the municipality of San Sebastian, Lempira.   Jose has always worked growing basic grains like beans and corn.  Five years ago he started growing coffee which currently generates the most income.  He sells his coffee in husk, wet, and dry throughout the region.
He's requesting a loan for 20,000 Lempiras to buy fertilizers and pay for labor at his coffee farm so he can improve his harvest and profits.  His challenge is to continue growing coffee to get ahead his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor at his coffee farm.

loans.name: Yeser  Suriel

texts.es: Yeser, tiene 30 años de edad, esta soltero, tiene un hijo y reside en una aldea del municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Yeser alquila un local donde tiene instalado su propio negocio de venta y reparación de teléfonos celulares de varios tipos. Para él esta actividad es su fuente de ingresos y ha decidido invertir mas para ampliar el inventario y aumentar las ventas. El préstamo que solicita es por 10,000 Lempiras para comprar mas celulares y repuestos para venta y reparación de los mismos. En un futuro su sueño es lograr tener un propio local para su negocio y tener un negocio mas grande.
texts.en:
Yeser is 30 years old, single and has one son. Yeser lives in a village in the municipality of Gracias, in Lempira. 

Yeser rents a property where he runs his own business selling and repairing various types of mobile phone. This work is his source of income, and Yeser has decided to invest more in order to increase stock and sales.

Yeser is applying for a loan of 10,000 Lempira in order to buy mobile telephones and spare parts to sell and repair phones.

In the future, Yeser dreams of having his own premises to run his business, and for the business to be larger.

loans.use: to buy mobile telephones and spare parts to sell and repair phones.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in a heated display case to store chorizo, pastries, stuffed potatoes, and "arepas".

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley works hard to support six children. She is married and has a business raising livestock in the Philippines.

Shirley requested a PHP 6,750 loan through NWTF to buy a solar lamp.

She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to have backup light in case of emergency.

Shirley is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money, but she is also helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: Jose Dolores

texts.es:
Dolores, es un muchacho trabajador, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica al comercio de ropa y tienen 1 hijo de 6 años de edad.

Dolores, desde pequeño aprendió a trabajar en la agricultura, pero con el paso de tiempo aprendió labores como la albañilería, la carpintería y el comercio; actualmente se dedica a la venta de ropa para niños, este trabajo lo desempeña con mucho ahínco en el mercado de la ciudad.

El préstamo que está solicitando es para terminar de hacer su casa, para vivir junto con su pareja y su hijo.

Dolores, sueña con terminar de construir su casa, porque actualmente vive en una casa que le pertenece a su hermano y en cualquier momento tendrá que entregársela; además le gustaría ampliar su negocio de modo que pudiera tener sus trabajadores y así cubrir más zonas de distribución.
texts.en:
Dolores is a hard working young man who obtained a bachelors degree.  His wife sells clothes and together they have a 6 year old son.  Dolores learned to work in agriculture since he was very young.  With time he learned masonry, carpentry, and commerce.  He currently sells children's clothes in the city market.  
He's requesting a loan to finish building his house where he will live with his wife and son.  Dolores' dream is to finish bulding his house because he currently lives at his brother's house and he may have to move out at any time.  Additonally he would like to expand his business and have some employees so he can have a larger distribution area.

loans.use: to finish building his house.

loans.name: Zeina

texts.en: Zeina is a 20-year-old married woman living with her husband. She is a very hard worker who strives to work under pressure in order to live a respectable life. She spent the last two years in her bakery, preparing delicious manakich and bread. She is well known in her town and people visit her from all over the neighboring areas. She always wanted to better develop her business and improve her work. For that reason, she decided to take a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase new ingredients such as flour and oil. She confirms that the loan will help her increase her sales, and thus her income.

loans.use: to purchase new ingredients such as flour and oil

loans.name: Mylene

texts.en: Mylene is 41 years old and still single. She is engaged in selling culled chicken around different villages. She has been in this business for almost one year. Mylene wishes that her business will last so that she will have a continuous source of income. Her partner in rounding up the chickens she sells is her brother. Mylene's goal is to help her relatives even in a simple way. Hence, she is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy chickens to sell. She believes that by having more capital, she will sell more chickens and gain a higher income. When she gains a higher income, she will also extend her help to her relatives.

loans.use: to buy chickens to sell.

loans.name: Maricon

texts.en:
Maricon is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. 

Maricon dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase an additional stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Nenita is 42 years old and one of her children is currently in school.

Nenita has a buy and sell of ready to wear clothing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of ready to wear like t-shirts, blouses, pants, shorts, blankets, etc. to sell to her customers.

Nenita has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of ready-to-wear like t-shirts, blouses, pants, shorts, and blankets to sell to her customers

loans.name: Cesaria

texts.en:
Cesaria is 57 years old and married. Cesaria works very hard to provide for her family.

Cesaria runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Cesaria has been in this business for 8 years and sells a variety of items such as candies, eggs, sanitary pads, coffee, detergent soap, diapers, etc. 

In the future, Cesaria would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Charisa

texts.en:
Charisa is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Charisa is 56 years old now.

Charisa has a business buying and selling beverages in the Philippines. Charisa requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stock of beverages to sell.

Charisa has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Charisa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of beverages to sell.

loans.name: Sada

texts.en:
Sada is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past one year, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of transportation in her place of operation. In addition she also operates a business of renting houses in the nearby town.

With the loan, she is requesting she wants to purchase a stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour.

loans.name: Mona

texts.en:
Mona is a 43-year-old Lebanese married woman. She lives with her husband and her four children who are still studying. Her husband is an employee and he provides the main source of income for the family and is the one able to enhance their way of living. 

Today she is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner, Vitas s.a.l., to pay the first installment of her children’s educational fees. In the future, she plans to take more Kiva loans and help them continue their education.

loans.use: to pay the first installment of her children’s educational fees.

loans.name: Rona

texts.en:
Rona is 32 years old and married with three children, one of whom is in school. Rona works very hard to provide for them.

Rona runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Rona has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, canned good and other groceries. 

In the future Rona would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.en:
Concepcion is 54 years old and is married with three children. With one child still in school, Concepcion works very hard to provide for them.

Concepcion runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 35,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries like detergent soap, milk, coffee, cereals, canned goods, noodles, etc. to sell.

Concepcion has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as detergent soap, milk, coffee, cereals, canned goods, noodles, etc. 

Concepcion would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries like detergent soap, milk, coffee, cereals, canned goods and noodles to sell.

loans.name: Ederlyn

texts.en:
As a parent of two children, Ederlyn works hard to support her family.

She has a fish-vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling rice. Ederlyn is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her fish-vending business.

Ederlyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Mona

texts.en:
Mona is a 47-year-old married woman living with her husband and two children. Her husband is the main source of income for the children, to satisfy the family's needs and to enable them to live a good lifestyle. She is dedicated to taking care of her family. 

Today, in order to pay her children university fees, she is applying for a new loan. She said that she is very happy and satisfied as she is able to pay their educational fees and ensure them a suitable educational path.

loans.use: to pay her children's university fees.

loans.name: Annaliza

texts.en:
Annaliza is 45 years old and has two children. Annaliza is married and has two children who are in school.

Annaliza is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Annaliza requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Annaliza has been in pig fattening for 8 years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Annaliza would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 42 years old and has five children. Evelyn is widowed and has one child who is currently in school.

Evelyn is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Evelyn requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Evelyn has been in pig fattening for 7 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Evelyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet works hard to support her family. Janet is married and has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines.

Janet requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell to her customers.

Janet has been in this business for 35 years now.

Janet would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Editha is 51 years old now.

Editha has a business buying and selling ready-to-wear in the Philippines. Editha requested a PHP 9,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy used clothes to sell.

Editha has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, Editha would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Felomina

texts.en:
Felomina is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Felomina is 43 years old and has three children who are in school.

Felomina has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. Felomina requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Felomina has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Felomina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Humberto De

texts.es:
Humberto es un hombre de 61 años de edad, sonriente, trabajador, una persona carismática que hoy necesita tu apoyo, un aliento económico para abastecer su negocio de pinturas.

Humberto es un hombre casado, tiene dos hijos ya mayores de edad y con familia, se encarga del sostenimiento de su hogar y de su señora, genera los alimentos, los medicamentos todo para su hogar, paga el arriendo gracias a su negocio, cabe aclarar que es lo único que tiene, trabajo como independiente toda su vida y no cuenta con una pensión que le ayude en la vejez.

Humberto quiere solicitar un préstamo para abastecer su negocio con pinturas a base de agua y a base de aceite.
texts.en:
Humberto is a 61-year-old man. He is a smiling, hardworking and charismatic person who is today seeking your help, an economic push to stock up his paints business.

Humberto is a married man. He has two adult children who have their own families. He takes care of the home maintenance and supports his wife. He also takes care of the food and medicines they need. He can pay the rent thanks to his business. It is important to say that this is everything he has. He has always been an independent worker and will not receive a pension when he gets old.

Humberto is requesting a loan to stock up his business. He sells water-based and oil-based paints.

loans.use: to buy paints to stock up his business.

loans.name: Holida

texts.en:
Holida is a spirited woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1996. She is living in a village with her family. She is married. She is busy in agriculture and has a practice in this sphere. 

After getting married, she and her husband started to keep livestock to earn money to live. She wants to enlarge her business and buy more livestock. She asked for a loan to buy livestock. 

Holida awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy livestock to enlarge her activity.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow so as to have milk to supply with his motorcycle.

loans.name: Florenda

texts.en:
Florenda is 50 years old and married with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Florenda has a business selling purified drinking water in the Philippines. Florenda requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more containers of purified drinking water to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Florenda has been in this business for 16 years. In the future, Florenda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more containers of purified drinking water to sell.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Gloria is 51 years old and has two children who are in school.

Gloria has a business buying and selling ready-to-wear in the Philippines. Gloria requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy items to sell like shirts, pants, etc.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Gloria has been in this business for 16 years. In the future, Gloria would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shirts and pants.

loans.name: Marivel

texts.en:
Marivel is 40 years old and single.

Marivel is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Marivel requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Marivel has been in this business for 5 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Marivel would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Ludivina

texts.en:
Ludivina is a married woman with eleven children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Ludivina is 52 years old and has five children who are in school.

Ludivina has a general store business in the Philippines. Ludivina requested a PHP 29,500 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Ludivina has been in this business for 13 years. In the future, Ludivina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Melva

texts.en:
As a parent of two children, Melva works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Melva is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Melva has been sustaining her business activities through her past 2 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Lourdes is 41 years old and has five children who are in school.

Lourdes has a processed food business in the Philippines. Lourdes requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients and other supplies for her business.

Lourdes has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Lourdes would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 54 years old, married with four children.

Lucia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

Lucia has borrowed and paid back 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 32 years and also earns an income from selling purified drinking water.

Lucia aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Andres Felipe

texts.es:
Un apoyo económico para la compra de insumos es lo que necesita este joven llamado Cristian (camisa azul), para promover su venta de calzado el cual realiza en su fábrica donde genera 4 empleos, en la foto tres de sus empleados.

Cristian es soltero trabaja por ayudar a sus padres, asumió los gastos del hogar con mucho gusto y busca llevar su negocio a otro nivel, producir mayor cantidad de  calzado ese es su objetivo es exportar a otras ciudad, mudarse a un local más amplio para empelar mayor número de personas.

Cristian se encuentra solicitando un préstamo la razón es que quiere comprar materia prima para le elaboración de calzado, el monto del dinero es que está haciendo una prueba de producir mucha más mercancía para  ver si sus vendedores son capaz de vender toda la producción, de ser así estaremos ante un futuro gran empresario del mundo del calzado.
texts.en:
Some financial support to buy materials is what this young man named Cristian needs (in the blue shirt) to promote his shoes selling. He makes the shoes in a factory where he employs 4 people.  

Cristian is single and he works to help his parents. He assumed the household expenses happily and he is seeking to bring his business to another level, producing a larger quantity of shoes. His goal is to export them to other cities and move to a bigger locale to employ more people. 

Cristian is asking for a loan because he wants to buy raw materials to make the shoes. The reason for that amount of money from the loan is because he is testing out making more merchandise to see if his salespeople are capable of selling everything he produces. If so, we will be seeing the future of a great entrepreneur in the world of shoes.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making shoes.

loans.name: Marta Cecilia

texts.es:
Ella es Martha es una mujer que quedó viuda, a cargo de un hogar y de tres hijos, no tenía un empleo era ama de casa, por fortuna hace poco había tomado unas clases de desarrollo de artesanías y bisutería y uso ese conocimiento para iniciar una empresa, opto por esta salida por necesidad económica ante la posibilidad de emplearse por la falta de experiencia laboral.

Martha con su negocio aspira a generar empleo, tener un local comercial, mejorar sus ventas, conseguir mas clientes, impulsar la venta y uso de artesanías en la zona, por ello se esfuerza en crear diseños originales y diferentes que impacten, algo salido de lo común.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de implementos para desarrollar collares, aretes y pulseras, artículos en pasta y acero principalmente.
texts.en:
This is Martha. She is a woman who was widowed and was left to run her home and raise her three children. She didn't have a job, as she was a housewife, but luckily she has taken classes not long before on how to make handicrafts and jewelry. She used that to start her own business. She decided to do this out of financial necessity because she lacked the work experience to get a job.

With her business, Martha hopes to generate employment, have a commercial locale, improve her sales, get more customers, and drive sales and the use of handicrafts in the area. That is why she is striving to create original and different designs that have an impact, something outside of the ordinary.  

She is asking for a loan to buy materials to make necklaces, earrings and bracelets, items mostly made from paste and steel.

loans.use: to buy materials to makes necklaces, earrings, and bracelets, mainly items made from paste and steel.

loans.name: Jose Lorgio

texts.es:
Lorgio, de 63 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado, está soltero y tiene cuatro hijos que residen en Estados Unidos, vive solo en su casa.

Lorgio, proviene de una familia desintegrada, sus padres se separaron cuando él tenía corta edad y fue criado por su madre quien le enseñó a trabajar en la agricultura, esta actividad no ha dejado de realizarla hasta el día de hoy, al igual que trabaja en la ganadería; sin embargo ha sido empleado por más de 32 años en un beneficio de café y actualmente es vigilante de un auto-lote que está a 1.5 kilómetros de su casa.

El préstamo solicitado es para comprar una novilla, pues se acerca el invierno y quiere aprovechar un terreno que le están alquilando para tener animales y así venderlos cuando tengan un mejor tamaño.

Lorgio, sueña con mantener siempre su trabajo y espera que sus hijos logren ser profesionales y personas de bien que sirvan a la sociedad.
texts.en:
Lorgio is 63 years old, studied until third grade, single, and has 4 children who live in the United States; he lives alone in his home.  Lorgio comes from a broken family.  His parents separated when he was very young and he was raised by his mother who taught him how to work in agriculture, work that he keeps doing to this day.  He also works raising cattle.  He's been employed at a coffe farm for 32 years and also works as a guard at a parking lot 1.5 km from his house.  
The loan requested is to buy a heifer.  The winter is approaching and he wants to take advantage of some land that he's leasing to have animals and take care of them to sell them later when they are larger.  Lorgio's dreams are to always have a job and that his children become professionals and men of good serving society.

loans.use: to buy a heifer.

loans.name: Blanca Irene

texts.es:
Ella es blanca una comerciante de 37 años de edad madre de tres hijos de 18, 17 y 5, se dedica a la venta de ropa y calzado, principalmente a familiares y amigos, una profesión que inicio para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y pensando mucho en sus hijos mayores que quieren ingresar a la universidad y esto tiene un costo elevado.

Buscando mejores aumentar sus ingresos para apoyar el progreso de sus hijos la señora blanca quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido de calzado y ropa para hombre y mujer, el cual iniciara a distribuir en la ciudad y pueblos, un esfuerzo enorme que realiza solo por amor a sus hijos, apoyando a este empresaria ayudarías a la consecución de un sueño familiar de tener la primera generación universitaria.
texts.en: This is Blanca. She is a 37 year old merchant and mother of three children who are 18, 17 and 5 years old. She makes a living selling clothing and shoes, mainly to family and friends. She started this job to help her husband with the household expenses, and thinking about her older children who want to go to college which is costly. Looking for better increases in her income to support her children's progress, Blanca is asking for a loan to buy an assortment of shoes and clothing for men and women. She will begin to distribute them in the city and towns. It is a huge effort that she makes for the sake of her children. You would be supporting the achievement of a family dream of having a first generation college student by supporting this businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of shoes and clothing for men and women.

loans.name: Sajed

texts.en:
Sajed is a 31-year-old married man from Jabalia. He is a father to one small son. Sajed finished his study a few years ago and became a lawyer. He trained in a professional law office and now he would like to open his own business.

Sajed took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a computer, a printer, and other supplies for his new law office. Sajed appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a computer, a printer, and other supplies for his new law office.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
Emilio tiene 60 años de edad, es casado, sin hijos a su cargo, cuenta con casa propia la cual esta ubicada en el distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú, es una zona rural donde los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y la crianza y venta de animales.

Emilio se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como gallinas, patos, pollos, entre otros, cuenta con varios años de experiencia en el rubro. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto el espera obtener mejores ingresos que le van a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Emilio is 60 years old. He is married and has no dependent children. He has his own home in the Oyotun District, Chiclayo Province, Lambayeque Region on the northern coast of Perú. His village is in a rural area where people work in agriculture and raising and selling animals.
Emilio makes his living raising and selling barnyard animals like chicken, ducks, hens, etc.  He has a number of years of experience in this line of work. Emilio is requesting a loan to buy more animals and increase his business' stock.  Thus, he will have a better income and improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy more animals and increase his business' stock.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Mario se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía, luego comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia, Mario está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
